    • Method Detail

      • isValid

        public static int isValid(java.lang.String card,
          boolean skipLengthCheck)
        Luhn's algorithm implementation to validate the card passed.
        Parameters:
        card - Card number. Require atleast first 4 to give a valid result.
        skipLengthCheck - skip the length check for Maestro cards.
        Returns:
        1 for valid card , 0 for invalid card.

      • visaCard

        public static boolean visaCard(java.lang.String card)
        Check for Visa Card.
        Parameters:
        card - Card number to be validated.
        Returns:
        True if card is Visa.

      • discoverCard

        public static boolean discoverCard(java.lang.String card)
        Check for Discover Card.
        Parameters:
        card - Card number to be validated.
        Returns:
        True if card is Discover else False.

        public static boolean visaCardWithoutLength(java.lang.String card)
        Check for Visa Card.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        True if card is Visa else False.

      • getCardDrawable

        public static int getCardDrawable(java.lang.String card)
        Returns the drawable of the card issuer.
        Parameters:
        card - Card number with atleast first four digits.
        Returns:
        Drawable int of appropriate issuer if found. Else returns drawable of R.drawable.ic_unknown_card.

      • getCardType

        public static java.lang.String getCardType(java.lang.String card)
        Returns the String Name of the card issuer.
        Parameters:
        card - Card number with atleast first four digits.
        Returns:
        Drawable int of appropriate issuer if found. Else returns Unknown.

      • validateCardTypeWithoutLengthForLimit

        public static int validateCardTypeWithoutLengthForLimit(java.lang.String card)
        Method to get the supposed length of the card type.
        Parameters:
        card - Card Number to validate, requires atleast first four digits of the card to return the valid length.
        Returns:
        Either actual length of the card type else default 19.

      • isDateExpired

        public static boolean isDateExpired(java.lang.String expiry)
        Check method to see if the card expiry date is valid.
        Parameters:
        expiry - Date string in the formt - MM/yy.
        Returns:
        True if the Date is expired Else False.
